custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: This collection was transferred from Rare Books on July 10, 1989.

did.unittitle: Porter Garnett to George H. Nelson 1926 March 29

scopecontent.p: Garnett of The Laboratory Press, Carnegie Institute of Technology, Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, expresses his great pleasure at sending Nelson a copy of Hildegarde Flanner's book That Endeth Never, printed by himself, because of Nelson's encouragement and interest in his work.
